## `SetBarChartBarColor`

Sets the bar color for bar charts\index{graphs!bar charts}.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetBarChartBarColor(string colorName)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` colorName | The name of the color to use. |
:::
